entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Problem: Unable to enable Hyper-V in my laptop with x64 #20373
  • HTML Label not applying Bold or Italics on iOS #20372
  • MAUI Navigation Bug in ToastNotificationManagerCompat.OnActivated #20370
  • .Net 8 Android App crashes only in release on physical device #20369
  • Searchhandler dissapears or does not appear at all #20367
  • Xamarin.UITest “iOSDeviceManager” will damage your computer. You should move it to the Bin #20364
  • [Android] Modal shown TabbedPage has problems with SetSoftInputMode AdjustResize #20358
    Backlog
  • CarouselView Snaps Back to First Page When Entry with Center or End HorizontalTextAlignment is Focused #20357
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps for Windows #20356
    Backlog
  • MAUI maps in .net 8 causes error on IOS CAMetalLayer ignoring invalid setDrawableSize width=0.000000 height=0.000000 #20355

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx-sr2' into `main` #20371
  • [iOS] Fixed RadioButton text related properties not working #20366
    community ✨
  • Add the multi-project template #20365
  • [net8.0] Update with main #20363
  • [net9.0] Update with main #20362

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx preview1] Update with preview1 changes #20321
  • Account for margins on sizes returned from Editor #20249
    area/controls 🎮, control-editor

Updated

  • If the current thread dispatcher is null return the app level dispatcher #20313
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Bring back some aspect of ConvertView on TableView and avoid AT_MOST Measure #20130
    area/ListView
  • [Trimming] Improve TypedBindings #19995
    area/app-size 🤏
  • Update SecureStorage.android.cs #20293
    platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Fix connectivity broadcast receiver never triggered on android 14.0/34+ #19968
    platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Applying visibility change to child controls #20154
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Android] Span line height fix #20352
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label
  • Fixed shell pages with top bar #20337
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [Core][Hosting] Resolve handler services through registered service types #20298
    do-not-merge, area/hosting 🧩
  • Fix DataTrigger behavior that can cause some strange inconsistencies #15655
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fixed android toolbar icon change #20166
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar
  • [iOS] Fixes carouselview layout on iOS #20001
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Applying global styles to shadows #20203
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fixed auto picker resizing after selection #20207
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-picker
  • Fixed Shell.NavBarHasShadow on Android #20188
    platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Android Shell BackButtonBehavior TextOverride #20179
    platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Fixed Switch Thumb and On Colors #20346
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-switch
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
